message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. You can try to negotiate if you want more.
I think I can do better than that. Your turn to respond!
That's a big increase for you, Bob. I'm not sure I'm comfortable with that. Let's see what you can do in the next round.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial split.
I'm not sure I want to give you the majority, but I'm willing to compromise. Your turn to respond!
I think we've reached a good compromise, Bob. I'll accept your offer and we can finalize the split.
